questions.question: How often do they initiate conversations with you?
options: Occasionally, but you usually start the chat

questions.question: What kind of compliments do they give you?
options: You're really attractive or flirtatious comments

questions.question: Do they remember small details about you?
options: Yes, they remember your favorite things

questions.question: How do they react to your physical touch (hug, arm tap, etc.)?
options: They pull away or seem uncomfortable

questions.question: Do they talk about their romantic interests with you?
How do they respond to your flirting?
options: They laugh it off or ignore it
They get awkward and change the subject

questions.question: Do they prioritize spending time with you?
options: Only if their other friends are busy

questions.question: Do they post about you on social media?
options: Yes, with friendly captions like Bestie!
Yes, with ambiguous or flirty captions

questions.question: How do they act when you mention dating someone else?
options: They act jealous or ask a lot of questions

questions.question: Do they make future plans with you (trips, events, etc.)?
How do they introduce you to others?
options: With a nickname or inside joke

questions.question: Do they respond quickly to your messages?
options: Days later or left on read

questions.question: Have they ever tried to set you up with someone else?
How do they look at you?
options: Quick glances, no lingering eye contact
